ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Error when read a record from ARC file use arcreader
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry about the NPE. Its been fixed in HEAD. The unit test that should have caught this prob. has also been fixed (It was reusing an extant ARCReader context.

Sorry about the NPE. Its been fixed in HEAD. The unit test that should
have caught this prob. has also been fixed (It was reusing an extant
ARCReader context. There is lesson to be had herein).

Please try again with HEAD.

St.Ack
